errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action

refresh.title: Refresh
refresh.description: Please refresh the page to continue.

error.title: Error Loading Deployments
error.description: There was a problem loading your deployments. Please try again later.

totalDeploys.label: Total Deploys
totalDeploys.tooltip: Total number of deployments in the last 30 days

avgPerDay.label: Avg. Deploys/Day
avgPerDay.tooltip: Average number of deployments per day over the last 30 days

successRate.label: Success Rate
successRate.tooltip: Percentage of successful deployments in the last 30 days

avgTime.label: Avg. Deploy Time
avgTime.tooltip: Average time taken to complete a deployment

signin.title: Sign In to GoDeploy
signin.details: Just enter your email, and we'll send you a link to get started. Whether you're new here or coming back, you're only a click away from joining the Audetic revolution resolution.

verify.checkInbox: Check your inbox! If we found your email address you'll have a link to login waiting for you.
verify.spam: Sometimes this can land in SPAM! While we hope that isn't the case if it doesn't arrive in a minute or three, please check.
